name: Path (Mrsh221)
description:
If you are a 'path finder' you should play it !

Use path information(00-000-00) and find your path. 2 left 3 up 2 right for example.

Each level is unique and there are 39 levels !

Use keyboard or w-a-s-d and most importantly use your logic and intelligence to reach green hole.

I hope you have fun !
